sn35.30:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissamiti.
sn35.30:1.3: Katama ca sa, bhikkhave, sabbamannitasamugghatasaruppa patipada?
sn35.30:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhum na mannati, cakkhusmim na mannati, cakkhuto na mannati, cakkhum meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.5: Rupe na mannati, rupesu na mannati, rupato na mannati, rupa meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.6: Cakkhuvinnanam na mannati, cakkhuvinnanasmim na mannati, cakkhuvinnanato na mannati, cakkhuvinnanam meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.7: Cakkhusamphassam na mannati, cakkhusamphassasmim na mannati, cakkhusamphassato na mannati, cakkhusamphasso meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.8: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na mannati, tasmimpi na mannati, tatopi na mannati, tam meti na mannati …pe…
sn35.30:1.9: jivham na mannati, jivhaya na mannati, jivhato na mannati, jivha meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.10: Rase na mannati, rasesu na mannati, rasato na mannati, rasa meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.11: Jivhavinnanam na mannati, jivhavinnanasmim na mannati, jivhavinnanato na mannati, jivhavinnanam meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.12: Jivhasamphassam na mannati, jivhasamphassasmim na mannati, jivhasamphassato na mannati, jivhasamphasso meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.13: Yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na mannati, tasmimpi na mannati, tatopi na mannati, tam meti na mannati …pe…
sn35.30:1.14: manam na mannati, manasmim na mannati, manato na mannati, mano meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.15: Dhamme na mannati, dhammesu na mannati, dhammato na mannati, dhamma meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.16: Manovinnanam na mannati, manovinnanasmim na mannati, manovinnanato na mannati, manovinnanam meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.17: Manosamphassam na mannati, manosamphassasmim na mannati, manosamphassato na mannati, manosamphasso meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.18: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na mannati, tasmimpi na mannati, tatopi na mannati, tam meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.19: Sabbam na mannati, sabbasmim na mannati, sabbato na mannati, sabbam meti na mannati.
sn35.30:1.20: So evam amannamano na ca kinci loke upadiyati.
sn35.30:1.21: Anupadiyam na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn35.30:1.22: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn35.30:1.23: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, sabbamannitasamugghatasaruppa patipada”ti.
